official_title: Feasibility of Implementation and Assessment of Geriatric Assessment Screening Tool in Outpatient Oncology Clinic
inclusion_criteria:
* NURSES: Assigned to two designated cancer clinics at Sidney Kimmel Cancer Center (SKCC) Center City, the Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC) and Lymphoma/myeloma clinics
* PATIENTS: 65 years and older
* PATIENTS: Diagnosis of cancer
Healthy volunteers allowed
exclusion_criteria: â€¢ PATIENTS: Inability to answer or have caregiver answer questions on screening tool
